knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

It's just a simple map, centered at London, UK.
```{r}
library(leaflet)
map <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  setView(lng = -0.118092, lat = 51.509865, zoom = 10)
map
```
